content: On the Taboola Anywhere front, 2022 was the year when Taboola News, our version of Apple News but for Android devices, exceeded $50 million in annual revenue, and it's growing triple digits. Your line is open. What we will say is, and it's obviously very unusual that a company would guide for 2024, we're confident enough in these investments that we believe we were confident to guide to 2024 for $200 million plus of adjusted EBITDA and over $100 million dollars of free cash flow. Your line is open. We announced it - while it's a startup, organic startup, we started at Taboola, it crossed the $50 million in revenue last year, similar margins to our overall business. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
